passwordHistory.title: Password History

analytics.title: Password Analytics

analytics.notEnough: Not enough password history to generate analytics

passwordHistory.noHistory: Password history is stored only in temporary memory and automatically shredded when you close the browser.

passwordLeakChecker.enterPassword: Enter password to check for leaks

results.notFound: Good news! Password not found in any breaches.
results.foundIn: Found in {{count}} of {{total}} databases â€¢ Confidence: {{level}}
results.compromised: This password has been exposed in data breaches and should be considered compromised.

actions.title: Recommended Actions:
actions.change: Change this password immediately on all sites where you use it
actions.noReuse: Never reuse this password - each account should have a unique password
actions.manager: Consider using a password manager to create and store strong passwords
actions.twoFactor: Enable two-factor authentication on all your important accounts
actions.monitor: Monitor your accounts for suspicious activity

secureShare.title: Share Password
secureShare.secureLinkInfo: This secure link expires in 24 hours and can only be viewed once.
secureShare.securityWarningText: This link contains sensitive information. Do not share it further unless you trust the recipient completely.
secureShare.infoBody: End-to-end encrypted links that expire after 24 hours and can only be viewed once.
